snippet: Beijing’s air pollution and the budget risk of Almaty, Kazakhstan, set off alarm bells at the I.O.C.
abstract: International Olympic Committee cites serious challenges with two bids for the 2022 Winter Olympics, including air pollution in Beijing and budget risks in Almaty, Kazakhstan.
lead_paragraph: Beijing’s air pollution and the budget risk of Almaty, Kazakhstan, set off alarm bells at the I.O.C.

headline.main: Officials Wary of Two Bids for 2022 Winter Olympics
headline.print_headline: Officials Concerned About Two Winter Bids
